body_html:
After I add "reuse=True" into tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell, it encounters error when it comes to lstm_outputs, hidden = lstm_cell(f_k, hidden)
The error is shown as:
ValueError: Variable lstm/basic_lstm_cell/kernel does not exist, or was not created with tf.get_variable(). Did you mean to set reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE in VarScope?

@reedwm
body_text:
After I add "reuse=True" into tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell, it encounters error when it comes to lstm_outputs, hidden = lstm_cell(f_k, hidden) 
The error is shown as:
ValueError: Variable lstm/basic_lstm_cell/kernel does not exist, or was not created with tf.get_variable(). Did you mean to set reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE in VarScope?
@reedwm
body:
After I add "reuse=True" into tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell, it encounters error when it comes to `lstm_outputs, hidden = lstm_cell(f_k, hidden) `
The error is shown as:
`ValueError: Variable lstm/basic_lstm_cell/kernel does not exist, or was not created with tf.get_variable(). Did you mean to set reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE in VarScope?`

@reedwm
